```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(tseries)
library(ggpubr)
library(forecast)
library(lubridate)
library(lmtest)
library(vars)
set.seed(2022)
data <- read.csv("CLOSINGPRICEDATA.csv")
data1 <- data[1:111,]
```



```{r}
var1 <- VAR(data1[,-1],p=8,type = 'const')
var1
```


```{r}
pred <- predict(var1)

ggplot()+geom_line(aes(x=as.Date(data$Date,format="%m/%d/%y"),y=data$BTC))+
  scale_x_date(date_labels = "%m-%Y",breaks = scales::pretty_breaks(n = 15))
```


```{r}
res <- resid(var1)


```
